title: Tommaso Checchi：MCPE 也有更自然的矿洞方块的表面
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-5-15 19:57 编辑 




@_tomcc
Same in MCPE! @DinnerBone "Caves finally cut through most natural surface blocks now!"
MCPE也会这样！@DinnerBone “新的矿洞终于能穿过大部分自然生成的地表方块了！”



MCPE离PC移植版又迈进了一大步！
